statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); session=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.session_id' | cut -c1-8); cd "$cwd" 2>/dev/null || true; if git rev-parse --git-dir >/dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo 'detached'); status=''; [ -n "$(git status --porcelain 2>/dev/null)" ] && status='*'; git_info=" [\033[32m$branch\033[31m$status\033[0m]"; else git_info=''; fi; printf "\033[1;33m$(basename "$cwd")\033[0m$git_info with \033[35m$model\033[0m [\033[36m$(date '+%H:%M:%S')\033[0m] \033[90m$session\033[0m"
